title: Game failed to reconnect and now i'm unable to join back. Im able to join a new game
body: so i was in the  middle of a  game and then the thing popped up at the top of the screen saying attempting to reconnect, i waited for two minutes so i closed the game. i open the launcher and i'm able to join a new game and the one i was just playing doesn't show up on my match history ?? spaghetti at its finest

replies.body: Is this the match with Jax?  It looks like it resulted as a disappearing game.  It's super rare to happen, but it can if the server accidentally drops the match.  Fortunately, though, you shouldn't receive any penalties as a result.  Hopefully everything is okay now!
